short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fully blocks distracting media content, including downloads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A blocker that attempts to identify and block certain content, has an almost impossible task. Technology is not sufficiently advanced so as to perfectly identify which content should be blocked. Therefore, the only secure option is a whitelist. 

This extension works by removing all image and video content from every page you visit. Websites can then be selectively added to a whitelist. When a site is on the whitelist, images and videos are visible on that site. When adding sites to the whitelist, there is a 24 hour cooldown period before the site is actually added. Pending sites will be listed in yellow.
